comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Presumably one of these guys is en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernest_Tubb He led the Texas Troubadours which played at the first Grand Ole Opry show from Carnegie Hall. PIctures at www.hillbilly-music.com/artists/story/index.php?id=10193 would seem to confirm that Tubb is in the light suit in the middle. But Bob McCoy doesn't seem to have been a member of the band. Maybe he's the guy hiding behind Tubb -- perhaps adjusting a mike.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: books.google.com/books?id=yygEAAAAMBAJ&lpg=RA1-PA22&a... www.legacy.com/ns/fullstory.aspx?storytype=1&storyid=42 is another biography, with a video of him singing "Walking the Floor Over You", a big hit for him and much heard and covered over the years. [ www.allmusic.com/song/t1431695 shows albums that have included the song.]
